column1: Topic title: Najib is not gov officer or public officer  Lmao

column8: text

Prime Minister Najib Abdul Razak has applied to strike out Petaling Jaya Utara MP Tony Pua's suit against him for misfeasance in public office in relation to 1MDB.Among the grounds, Najib stated that Pua filed the suit for political purpose and that he is not a public officer nor a government servant.Najib also raised the question of Pua's legal standing in initiating the suit and claimed that the ingredients of tort of misfeasance in public office have not been fulfilledhttp://m.malaysiakini.com/news/372637
